chatGPTUsage.description: How frequently and effectively is the chatGPT function used in the code? [0-10] where 0 is not used or used ineffectively and 10 is used frequently and effectively

modelBudgetAndTokenManagement.description: How well does the code handle model budgeting and token management? [0-10] where 0 is poor management and 10 is efficient management

textProcessingUtilities.description: How well does the code utilize text processing utilities for tasks like shortening or sanitizing text? [0-10] where 0 is not using utilities or using them ineffectively and 10 is using utilities effectively. Prompt text, token management, prompt template literals, and prompt string concatenations are another category--they are not considered text processing utilities.

promptConstruction.description: How well does the code construct prompts using template literals, string concatenation, or constant declarations? [0-10] where 0 is poorly constructed prompts and 10 is well-constructed prompts

textWrappingUtilities.description: How effectively does the code use text wrapping utilities for managing input and output text? [0-10] where 0 is not using utilities or using them ineffectively and 10 is using utilities effectively
